name: Color Out In Space
description:
What is this? A game for ants? 
This game was designed specifically at the resolution of 96 x 96 pixels for a game jam limitation. Please feel free to hit the little maximize button, but know that I have actually finished this game in its original resolution. Also, click the planets!

Story:

The solar system has been invaded by a nefarious alien plague of COLOR. The Federation has sent you in a suit that is designed to absorb and adapt to this plague and try to put things right again!
